newsitem.title: USA: TABLE - Price Communications Cellular sells notes.
newsitem.headline: TABLE - Price Communications Cellular sells notes.

text.p: The following 144a issue of senior discount notes from Price Communciations Cellular Holdings Inc, an affiliate of Price Communications Corp, was priced on Thursday, via Natwest Capital Markets Ltd, according to a market source.
BORROWER PRICE COMMUNICATIONS CELLULAR HOLDINGS INC
TYPE NOTES ISS PRICE 52.149 FIRST PAY DATE 2/1/1998
LAST MOODY'S CAA1 YIELD 13.50 YTM PAY FREQ SEMI-ANNUAL
LAST S&P N/R SPREAD +746 BPS CALLABLE NON-CALL FIVE
NOTE: The notes were done as units with warrants for nine percent of the company. ((Caryn Trokie, 212-859-1678))
